content:
As the VP of Sales for Cognizant, you can create a new account strategy to sell IT support and consulting services to Seagen Inc located in Bothell, Seattle. Here's how:

1. Identify the needs and challenges of Seagen Inc [[1](https://www.salesforce.com/products/anywhere/resources/account-planning-strategy/)].
2. Develop a comprehensive digital strategy that addresses the challenges and aligns with Seagen Inc's business objectives [[2](https://www.cognizant.com/us/en/services/digital-strategy)].
3. Highlight how Cognizant can provide operational efficiencies and help Seagen Inc stay ahead of its competition with our unique blend of human insight and superhuman speed [[3](https://www.cognizant.com/us/en/services/consulting)].
4. Emphasize the importance of strategic account management and the role that the collaboration between Cognizant and Seagen Inc will play in achieving growth objectives [[4](https://www.richardson.com/sales-resources/strategic-sales-key-account-management-strategy/)].
5. Leverage your experience as a Technology Services Executive to transition Seagen Inc through the implementation process, effectively blending strategic vision with tactical execution to achieve the desired business outcome. [[5](https://www.linkedin.com/in/robvatter)].
